data.title: Use scale in RenderSimple.RenderPreview.
data.body: Fixes #3970.

data.title: Extract contrail fading for dead projectiles into an IEffect.
data.body: Removes some ugly code and potentially fixes for #3845.

data.title: Replays (from current version) crash game in Ubuntu 13.10
data.body:
Everytime I want to watch a replay the game crashes within 1 or 2 seconds after opening the replay. Replay from the same game version.

Ubuntu 13.10, game version 20130915.

Exception of type `System.InvalidOperationException`: Out of sync in frame 18: Blame Tick.
 Compare syncreport.log with other players.
  at OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.OutOfSync (Int32 frame, System.String blame) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.CheckSync (System.Byte[] packet) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.OrderManager+<TickImmediate>c__AnonStorey14.<>m__4 (Int32 clientId, System.Byte[] packet) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.ReplayConnection.Receive (System.Action`2 packetFn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Network.OrderManager.TickImmediate () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Sync+<CheckSyncUnchanged>c__AnonStorey36.<>m__72 () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged[Boolean] (OpenRA.World world, System.Func`1 fn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged (OpenRA.World world, System.Action fn) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Tick (OpenRA.Network.OrderManager orderManager) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Tick (OpenRA.Network.OrderManager orderManager, OpenRA.Graphics.Viewport viewPort) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Game.Run () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Run (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at OpenRA.Program.Main (System.String[] args) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0

data.title: Spectator leaves game, add suffix to server message
data.body:
It would be nice if a spectator leaves a running game the message would something be like:

"Server: Player abc disconnected (Spectator)"
or
"Server: Spectator abc disconnected"

Currently is not clear whether the player who leaves was an active player or a spectator.

data.title: Made Travis CI bot IRC notifications less noisy
data.body: spotted at https://github.com/etlegacy/etlegacy/blob/master/.travis.yml

data.title: Scale: issue
data.body:
```
    RenderBuilding:
        Scale: 2.0
```

It scales the building up to 200 %, but if you select the building and hold it over the map it appears in 100% size. Only when you place the building it will transform to 200%.

data.title: Improved hotkey support
data.body:
This re-implements hotkeys in a more general manner. It is now possible to set hotkeys with modifiers, and the UI for setting them is improved.

Fixes #3779 and the main blockers of #3315 and #2243.

Duplicating the symbol tables from SDL is unfortunate, but I couldn't see a cleaner way of referencing them.

data.title: Wired up draggable windows as a GUI setting
data.body: followup of #2965

data.title: PlayerResources doesn't work
data.body:
```
Player:
    PlayerResources:
        SelectableCash: 2500,5000,10000,20000 # Type: Int32[]
```

Doesn't work anymore.

data.title: Disconnect to irc is weird
data.body:
I get a lof of messages, and one time crash, if I press dc from irc in lobby.
Try pressing it twice fast
1019

data.title: Chopper targets something not there
data.body:
1019, my chopper did target buildings not there, and airfields far away...
seeing or not seeing the spot

http://imgur.com/qPpACE7

data.title: Base under attack notification is played whenever teammate engineers repair your buildings
Wired up IRC debug settings
data.body: for better bug reports as this feature is hot of the press.

data.title: Test the packaging scripts with Travis
data.body: small steps towards #3775 and avoid disasters like the last playtest release.

data.title: Simplified the RPM build scripts again
data.body: and some other stuff while looking through the package.log files.

data.title: Removed TilesetBuilder from core
data.body: as it duplicated tools.

data.title: Ship COPYING and CHANGELOG on all platforms
data.body: fixes the DEBIAN changelog entry file not found on the build server, too.

data.title: veterancy icons drawn below actor shp
data.body: with a build from the latest bleed, the veterancy icons are drawn below the unit, at least for infantry, making them nearly invisible.

data.title: Make ra husks targetable so players can remove them if needed
Units Groups GUI
data.body:
Like other RTS games, it's possible to create groups of units with CTRL+number (from 1 to 9).

Using these hotkeys is fast but what if OpenRA could display a small GUI for selecting groups quickly ?

![groups](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1732773/1361780/f00e1798-380c-11e3-904c-3ea616aef94f.png)

If no group exists then the GUI would disappear.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1028154-units-groups-gui?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Small UI changes to help Translators
data.body:
Small UI changes to help translators use longer words in some foreign
languages.
- Asset Browser: wider buttons
- Settings window: the "Scroll Speed" scrollbar has been moved 20px to
  the right

(based on https://github.com/Mailaender/OpenRA/tree/translation)

data.title: Add new Tileset to Map
data.body:
It would be nice if Map-Designers are able to add new Tilesets in a Map.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1028156-add-new-tileset-to-map?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Add custom Build Tabs to maps
data.body:
In /rules/system.yaml and in /chrome.yaml are the Tabs for the units defined.
Building / Defense / Infantery / etc. 
It would be nice if Map-Editors can add their own Tabs like "Fake-Building" or "Tanks".
For this you you have to add Tab-Images like the /uibits/tabs.png and the rule ClassicProductionQueue@XYZ.

<bountysource-plugin>

---

Want to back this issue? **[Place a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/1028157-add-custom-build-tabs-to-maps?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>
